javadoc: This manager is responsible for reading and writing datatypes in XML.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a new data types XML manager.

params.name: dataManager
params.comment: the data type manager to read from or write to

params.name: log
params.comment: the message log for recording datatype warnings

methods.name: read
methods.comment:
Reads the datatypes encoded in XML from the specified XML parser and recreates
 them in a datatype manager.

throws.comment: if an XML parse error occurs
if the user cancels the read operation

methods.name: write
methods.comment: Writes datatypes into XML using the specified XML writer.

throws.comment: if the user cancels the write operation

methods.name: writeAsXMLForDebug
methods.comment:
Output data types in XML format for debugging purposes.
 NOTE: There is no support for reading the XML produced by this
 method.

throws.comment: if there was a problem writing to the file

name: DataTypesXmlMgr
comment: This manager is responsible for reading and writing datatypes in XML.
